markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Empathy Charm](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2151)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Companion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=29" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 105 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 35 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to harness

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This charm, usually placed on an animal companion's collar, contains a single strand of your hair, as well as one of your animal companion's, creating a link that better transmits emotional cues to a trained psychological assistance animal.

<document level="2" id="action-1655" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Empathy Charm

text: <title level="1" right="Item 2" pfs="Standard" > Empathy Charm Source Treasure Vault pg. 105 1.1 Price 35 gp Usage affixed to harness --- This charm, usually placed on an animal companion's collar, contains a single strand of your hair, as well as one of your animal companion's, creating a link that better transmits emotional cues to a trained psychological assistance animal.
